hibernate-mapping.query: UPDATE Message a SET a.mesBox = :trash WHERE a.mesName in (:mids) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)
UPDATE Message a SET a.mesBox = :trash WHERE a.mesBox in (:box) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)

UPDATE Message a SET a.mesBox = :trash WHERE a in (select b.id.message from LabMes b WHERE b.id.label in (from Label c where c.labIdint = :label)) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)
UPDATE Message a SET a.mesBox = :hidden WHERE a.mesName in (:mids) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)

UPDATE Message a SET a.mesFlagged = (CASE WHEN a.mesFlagged = true THEN false WHEN a.mesFlagged = false THEN true ELSE null END) WHERE a.mesName in (:mids) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)

UPDATE Message a SET a.mesRecent = (CASE WHEN a.mesRecent = true THEN false WHEN a.mesRecent = false THEN true ELSE null END) WHERE a.mesName in (:mids) AND a.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username)
DELETE FROM LabMes a WHERE a.id.message in (from Message b where b.mesName in (:mids) AND b.users = (from Users i where i.useUsername = :username))
